title: Development of Video Utilization Strategies for Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science curriculum instruction experience and understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: A program for in-service science teachers to enhance practical skills using video-based instructional methods

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science lecture videos according to the rule-example model and extract core teaching principles with 80% accuracy
Learners can create science subject-optimized lesson designs based on actual class videos following the example-rule model
Learners can compare advantages and disadvantages of video-based teaching methods and develop appropriate video application strategies for specific learning objectives
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
